commandDescription: Command will open SoqlXplorer in the SalesforceDX scratch org specified
messageOpeningSoqlxForOrg: Opening SoqlXplorer for org {0} using username {1}
errorConnectionNotAccessingTokenBased: The CLI authentication for the org specified is access token based.  SoqlXplorer cannot be connected in this manner.  Try using the standard username/password approach instead.
errorGeneral: The following error occured.  If it occurs again, please report it.
flagDebugDescription: Debug flag to display more information about connection
